T02TD2528E:182b-0: @182b * // rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga rab gnas kyi rgyal po bzhugs /
T02TD2528E:182b-2: # // bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2528E:182b-3: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la //
T02TD2528E:182b-4: kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2528E:182b-5: rgyud rnams thams cad las bsdus te//
T02TD2528E:182b-6: rab gnas cho ga bshad par bya //
T02TD2528E:182b-7: de la dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang thob pa /
T02TD2528E:182b-8: rig pa'i sdom pa gzung ba /
T02TD2528E:182b-9: gsang ba'i mchod ba'i bya ba shes pa /
T02TD2528E:182b-10: dpa' la brtan pa spro ba che ba /
T02TD2528E:182b-11: dul ba phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i spyod ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD2528E:182b-12: gsang ba'i ye shes bslabs pa /
T02TD2528E:182b-13: phyag rgya bzhi bsgom par mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /
T02TD2528E:182b-14: sgrub pa'i grogs po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa /
T02TD2528E:182b-15: gsang ba'i cho ga'i bya ba shes pa /
T02TD2528E:182b-17: gsang ba'i bya ba la mkhas pa /
T02TD2528E:183a-2: grong khyer ram grong rdal lam /
T02TD2528E:183a-6: gtsug lag khang du lugs su blugs pa'am /
T02TD2528E:183a-8: ri mor bris pa zhi ba'am /
T02TD2528E:183a-10: mngon spyod la sogs pa'i sku rab tu gnas pa byed par 'dod na /
T02TD2528E:183a-11: dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi'i nye 'khor du dris nye bar byugs nas dkon mchog gsum dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-12: rab tu gnas par byed pa'i lha dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-13: rdo rje slob dpon la dmigs te /
T02TD2528E:183a-14: mandala lnga byas nas mchod pa lnga bshams nas stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bgos nas cod pan dang rgyan btags te /
T02TD2528E:183a-15: phreng pa dang dag byed dang ldan pas /
T02TD2528E:183a-16: skar ma rgyal dang gza' phur bu'i nyin par khrus byas shing zas dkar gsum zos pa /
T02TD2528E:183a-17: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang dril bu rnams bris te /
T02TD2528E:183a-18: gu gul gyi dud pas bdugs pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-19: yungs kar gyis bgegs bzlog nas bsnyen pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-20: de la re zhig rnam par rtog pa shas chung na /
T02TD2528E:183a-21: stong pa nyid kyis khrus bya ba /
T02TD2528E:183a-22: lce byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-23: lag pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-24: khro bo bzhi'i lus bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-25: khro bo gsum gyis bgegs bsal ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-26: khro bo drug gis phyogs bcing ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-27: khro bo gsum gyis ra ba dang dra ba byas la /
T02TD2528E:183a-28: mchod pa byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2528E:183a-29: rdo rje 'khor los dkyil 'khor sprul la /
T02TD2528E:183a-30: mchod pa dang phyag btsal ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-32: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-33: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-34: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-35: mchod pa'i sprin dang lus dbul ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-36: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-37: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-39: gzugs brnyan gyi lhar bskyed nas mnyam pa'i thal mo dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-44: dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-45: ngan song dgug cing sdig pa dral ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183a-46: dkyil 'khor snying gar bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-0: @183b mngon par byang chub lngas lhar bskyed la /
T02TD2528E:183b-2: ting nge 'dzin gyi bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-3: snying gar dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-4: phrin las kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-5: rnal 'byor chen po bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-6: rjes su rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-9: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la /
T02TD2528E:183b-10: bdag nyid thabs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2528E:183b-11: ye shes kyis sbyong ba stong pa nyid bsgoms pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-12: rdo rje'i sa sbyang ba 'byung ba rim brtsegs gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bskyed pa dang ;
T02TD2528E:183b-13: 'chi ba'i srid pa ri rab kyi rtse mor lus gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-14: srid pa bar ma do bsam gtan gzugs med pa bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-15: skye ba'i rnal 'byor byang chub sems dpa' don grub tu bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-16: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bslangs nas dang bo'i sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-19: ye shes sems dpa' zhugs pa'i las brgyad kyi ye shes sems dpa' bcug la /
T02TD2528E:183b-20: rgyas btab nas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-21: mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la /
T02TD2528E:183b-22: ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2528E:183b-23: de ltar mtshan ma ma thob kyi bar du bsgom pa'am /
T02TD2528E:183b-25: 'khor rnams la khri khri bzlas pa dbul ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-26: rgyu phyi ma'i phyi ma bzhin du /
T02TD2528E:183b-27: zla ba bzhi'am zla ba drug tu bsnyen pa bya'o //
T02TD2528E:183b-28: de ltar bsnyen pa byas nas sa sbyang ba'am /
T02TD2528E:183b-29: ma sbyangs pa'i gnas sa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2528E:183b-31: de la mchod pa bsham pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-32: rdzas bsags la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la gdong dri zhim par byas la /
T02TD2528E:183b-33: me tog gi phreng ba btags te /
T02TD2528E:183b-34: rgyu skar rgyal gyi zhag dang gza' phur bu la srung ba'i 'khor lo rten dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-35: tshogs sogs pa'i dmigs pa'i yul dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-36: tshogs kyi lam dngos sems bskyed pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-37: rdo rje dbab pa cho ga bzhin du bya ba dang /
T02TD2528E:183b-38: phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin du bcing ba dang /
T02TD2528E:184a-0: mdun du sems dpa' cho ga bzhin du bskyed de bdag nyid rdzogs @184a * //
T02TD2528E:184a-2: 'byung ba ri rab dang bcas pa bskyed pa'i steng du sa'i lha mo spyan drangs la /
T02TD2528E:184a-3: cho ga bzhin du de nas dpang du gsol te ji ltar bzhin du spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2528E:184a-4: de nas bsam gtan dang gzugs med kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du byas nas /
T02TD2528E:184a-5: 'og min du don grub kyi gzugs su skyes par bsams la /
T02TD2528E:184a-6: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2528E:184a-7: de nas dang por sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2528E:184a-10: bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas /
T02TD2528E:184a-11: sgrub pa'i grogs kyis mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba btab la /
T02TD2528E:184a-12: bdag nyid 'khor los sgyur ba'i ched du brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2528E:184a-13: dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la khro bo'i bstod pa dang /
T02TD2528E:184a-14: bgegs la bka' bsgo ba byas nas /
T02TD2528E:184a-15: rdo rje'i lta bas rab dang /
T02TD2528E:184a-17: stang stabs kyis bgegs bsal ba dang /
T02TD2528E:184a-18: sngags dang phyag rgyas srung ba'i 'khor lo byas la /
T02TD2528E:184a-20: de'i yan lag phur bu ji lta ba bzhin du btab nas /
T02TD2528E:184a-21: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la dri'i thig le dang me tog tshom bu bkod la /
T02TD2528E:184a-22: lha lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2528E:184a-23: de nas bum pa lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02TD2528E:184a-24: sbyin sreg lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02TD2528E:184a-25: gtor ma lhag par gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2528E:184a-26: de nas shing bu gru gsum gyi nang du kham phor bzhag nas /
T02TD2528E:184a-27: der me blugs la zur gsum du bag zan gyis kong bu gsum byas te /
T02TD2528E:184a-28: der me mar btang nas bag zan gyi chang pa gsum byas nas /
T02TD2528E:184a-29: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi sngags sam /
T02TD2528E:184a-30: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis yungs kar gyis bgegs bzlog par bya'o //
T02TD2528E:184a-31: sku gzugs sam glegs bam la sogs pa rab gnas gang byed pa de ras kyis g-yogs la /
T02TD2528E:184a-32: h'um bhr'um hr'i:gsum gyis bsrungs nas gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2528E:184a-33: de nas snyan gsan dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2528E:184a-34: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD2528E:184a-35: dga' ldan du ni bzhugs pa na //
T02TD2528E:184a-36: lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar //
T02TD2528E:184b-0: de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'dir @184b bzhugs shig /'di ru mgon po brtan bzhugs nas //
T02TD2528E:184b-1: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2528E:184b-2: che ge mo yi don slad du //
T02TD2528E:184b-3: bdag ni 'byor pa nyid kyis ni //
T02TD2528E:184b-4: ci 'byor pa yis mchod pa rnams /
T02TD2528E:184b-5: me tog la sogs 'di bzhes shig / bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la /
T02TD2528E:184b-6: rjes su brtse bar dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2528E:184b-7: kun gyis 'di la byin brlab cing //
T02TD2528E:184b-8: de nyid du ni bzhugs par rigs //
T02TD2528E:184b-9: de nas nyid ma shar ba na dkyil 'khor gyi thig btab la /
T02TD2528E:184b-10: tshon dgye zhing lha dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las bshad pa bzhin byas la /
T02TD2528E:184b-11: rdzas bsags nas dkyil 'khor gyi mthar bkram ste /
T02TD2528E:184b-12: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba bskang la /
T02TD2528E:184b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su khrus kyi khang ba yid du 'ong ba /
T02TD2528E:184b-15: shel gyi sa gzhi la rin po che'i ka bas brgyan ba /
T02TD2528E:184b-16: mu tig dang rin po ches spras pa brtsigs pa'am bris la /
T02TD2528E:184b-17: rab tu gnas pa byed par 'dod pas /
T02TD2528E:184b-18: thog mar khrus kyi khang pa der lha spyan drangs la /
T02TD2528E:184b-20: ras ris pu sti la sogs pa yin na mdun du bzhag la /
T02TD2528E:184b-21: me long bstan la bum pa rnams kyis sku khrus gsol ba bstod dbyangs dang bcas pa bya ste /
T02TD2528E:184b-23: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD2528E:184b-24: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD2528E:184b-25: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02TD2528E:184b-26: de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol //
T02TD2528E:184b-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD2528E:184b-28: de nas rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i /
T02TD2528E:184b-29: lha yi sku la gnas gsum du /
T02TD2528E:184b-30: yi ge aom a'a:h'um gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2528E:184b-31: gser dngul lam zangs las byas pa bu ma pa lto ba yangs pa mgrin pa ring ba mchu 'phyad ba /
T02TD2528E:184b-32: sman dang 'bru dang rin po che lnga dang ldan pa /
T02TD2528E:184b-33: ras sar pas mgul pa bcings pa /
T02TD2528E:184b-34: ldu bcas lcug mas kha brgyan la /
T02TD2528E:184b-35: sngar bsnyen pa byas pa'i dri'i chus gang slob dpon gyis yongs su bzung nas /
T02TD2528E:184b-36: me long dri'i thig le lnga dang /
T02TD2528E:184b-37: til mar thigs pa lnga dang /
T02TD2528E:184b-38: me tog gi tshom bu lnga dang /
T02TD2528E:184b-39: 'dag chal dang bcas pa'i bir gyis byangs la /
T02TD2528E:184b-40: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad ba dang /
T02TD2528E:185a-0: rdza rdo la sogs pa rol mo'i sgra dang bcas @185a */
T02TD2528E:185a-1: bas sku khrus gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2528E:185a-2: de la til mar gyi sngags ni /
T02TD2528E:185a-3: aom sarbba th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:185a-6: d'ur ba'i pir gyi sngags ni /
T02TD2528E:185a-7: aom ma l'a sam sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:185a-8: de nas sku khrus gsol ba'i bstod dbyangs ni //
T02TD2528E:185a-9: gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag pa //
T02TD2528E:185a-10: nyon mongs gti mug sbyong byed pa //
T02TD2528E:185a-11: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis //
T02TD2528E:185a-12: dpal ldan sku yi khrus gsol lo //
T02TD2528E:185a-13: tshor ba'i phung bo rnam dag pa //
T02TD2528E:185a-14: nyon mongs nga rgyal sbyong byed pa'i //
T02TD2528E:185a-15: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis //
T02TD2528E:185a-16: dpal ldan yon tan dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2528E:185a-17: 'du shes phung bo rnam dag pa //
T02TD2528E:185a-18: nyon mongs 'dod chags sbyong byed pa'i //
T02TD2528E:185a-19: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis //
T02TD2528E:185a-20: dpal ldan gsung gi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2528E:185a-21: 'du byed phung po rnam dag pa //
T02TD2528E:185a-22: nyon mongs phrag dog sbyong byed pa //
T02TD2528E:185a-23: bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis /
T02TD2528E:185a-24: dpal ldan phrin las dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2528E:185a-25: rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa //
T02TD2528E:185a-26: nyon mongs zhe sdang sbyong byed pa'i //
T02TD2528E:185a-27: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis //
T02TD2528E:185a-28: dpal ldan thugs kyi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2528E:185a-29: ji ltar dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan nas //
T02TD2528E:185a-30: lha mdzes lhums nas bltams la khrus gsol ltar //
T02TD2528E:185a-31: sku gdung ring bsrel dri ma med par bcas //
T02TD2528E:185a-32: sprul sku yid 'ong rnam la khrus gsol lo //
T02TD2528E:185a-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta su na su pra tishtha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:185a-42: gandha bha dra dang bcas pa sku gzugs nyid dam /
T02TD2528E:185a-43: me long gi steng du btab la /
T02TD2528E:185a-44: tsanda dang ga bur gyi dri'i thig le byas la /
T02TD2528E:185a-45: me tog dang bcas pa la ku sha'i pir gyis bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD2528E:185a-46: de ltar sku la sogs pa lan gsum ma ma lnga ldar bkrus nas /
T02TD2528E:185a-47: gos gtsang ma'i dris bsgos pas sku phyis te /
T02TD2528E:185a-48: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rnams la ni //
T02TD2528E:185a-49: bla gos dang snam sbyar gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2528E:185a-50: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gos sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2528E:185a-51: khro bo rnams la ni gos sngon po dang /
T02TD2528E:185b-0: dmar po dbul zhing bkra shis kyi tshigs @185b su bcad pa gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2528E:185b-1: de la snam sbyar gsol ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD2528E:185b-2: aom d'i pa bra ba ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:185b-3: de la dri dbul ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD2528E:185b-5: de la byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa la rgyan dbul ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD2528E:185b-6: aom a'a ba ra na bi bhu sha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:185b-7: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po spyan drangs la gtsug lag khang yin na mdun nam phyogs su ma yo zhing drang bar sku gzugs mdzes par bkod la /
T02TD2528E:185b-8: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gtso bo dang bcas pa mdun der bstan la dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas bdag dang gtso bo dang tha mi dad par bsgoms la p'u dza bya'o //
T02TD2528E:185b-9: de ltar bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2528E:185b-10: p'u dza rdzogs pa'i rjes la rab gnas kyi lha la p'u dza lnga phul nas dam tshig sems dpa' yi ge h'um gyis bsal bar byas la /
T02TD2528E:185b-11: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te rgyud las 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la dbang bskur nas dngos su 'byor pa'i p'u dza lnga dang /
T02TD2528E:185b-12: yid kyis sprul ba brgyad dang /
T02TD2528E:185b-13: rig ma bcu drug gis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2528E:185b-14: de la me tog dbul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
T02TD2528E:185b-15: chu dang thang las skyes pa yi //
T02TD2528E:185b-16: me tog dam pa mchog 'di dag / mchog tu dad pas 'bul lags na //
T02TD2528E:185b-17: khyod kyis ci bder bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2528E:185b-19: lhan cig skyes dang sbyar byung ba'i //
T02TD2528E:185b-20: lha rdzas dam pa'i bdug pa 'di //
T02TD2528E:185b-21: mchog tu dad pas 'bul lags na //
T02TD2528E:185b-22: khyed kyis ci bder bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2528E:185b-24: lhan cig skyes dang sbyar byung ba'i //
T02TD2528E:185b-25: lha dang mi yi dri mchog 'di //
T02TD2528E:185b-26: mchog tu dang bas 'bul lags na //
T02TD2528E:185b-27: ci bder bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2528E:185b-29: bza' dang bca' ba phun tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2528E:185b-30: kha dog dri dang ro ldan pa'i //
T02TD2528E:185b-32: bdag gis 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2528E:185b-33: aom badzra nee bi dye a'a:h'um /
T02TD2528E:185b-34: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni //
T02TD2528E:185b-35: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na //
T02TD2528E:185b-36: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
T02TD2528E:185b-37: rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas //
T02TD2528E:185b-38: rdo rje las rnams byed par shog / ces brjod cing /
T02TD2528E:185b-39: badzra satva su sam gra ha ta /
T02TD2528E:185b-40: ces pa la sogs pa glu blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2528E:186a-1: dbyangs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor nas byung ba'i rig ma bcu drug gi phyag rgya dang bcas pas kyang mchod bar bya'o //
T02TD2528E:186a-2: de nas gzugs rin chen sna bdun dang /
T02TD2528E:186a-6: bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad dang ;
T02TD2528E:186a-7: sgra rol mo cha byad bcu dang /
T02TD2528E:186a-10: reg bya ras zung brgya'am stong ngam /
T02TD2528E:186a-11: tha ma yang spyir zung gcig dbul lo //
T02TD2528E:186a-12: de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyis mchod la /
T02TD2528E:186a-13: sbyin sreg dang gtor ma byas la /
T02TD2528E:186a-15: phyi de nang par nyi ma shar kar spyan dbye bar bya ste /
T02TD2528E:186a-16: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2528E:186a-17: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02TD2528E:186a-18: de bzhin rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan //
T02TD2528E:186a-19: sems can don du dbye bar bgyi //
T02TD2528E:186a-20: aom tsakshu tsakshu sa manta tsakshu bi shodha ni sv'ah'a /
T02TD2528E:186a-21: zhes bya bas gser la sogs pa'i thur mas spyan dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2528E:186a-22: de nas snyan dbye bar bya ste /
T02TD2528E:186a-23: gser la sogs pa'i rna 'bru thogs la /
T02TD2528E:186a-24: 'gro rnams thos pas phongs gyur ba //
T02TD2528E:186a-25: rgyal bas chos kyi rnga brdungs ltar //
T02TD2528E:186a-26: de bzhin sems can don gyi phyir //
T02TD2528E:186a-27: rgyal ba'i snyan ni dbye bar bgyi //
T02TD2528E:186a-28: aom d'i bya karna ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:186a-29: de nas shangs dbye bar bya ste /
T02TD2528E:186a-30: gser la sogs pa'i smad tsher thogs te /
T02TD2528E:186a-31: zag bcas phung po dri spangs pa'i //
T02TD2528E:186a-32: 'gro ba'i sems can don bgyid phyir //
T02TD2528E:186a-33: rnam par dag pa dri brnyes ltar //
T02TD2528E:186a-34: rgyal ba'i shangs ni dbye bar bya //
T02TD2528E:186a-35: d'i bya gha na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:186a-36: de nas thur ma thogs la zhal dbye bar bya ste /
T02TD2528E:186a-37: 'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad ltar //
T02TD2528E:186a-38: ro mchog brgya ldan zhal zas dam pa 'di //
T02TD2528E:186a-39: dbul zhing zhi ba'i zhal ni dbye bar bya //
T02TD2528E:186a-40: aom di bya mo kha ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:186a-41: de nas spu gri thogs la /
T02TD2528E:186a-42: rab tu byung ba'i gzugs yin na //
T02TD2528E:186a-43: skra bzhar ba ltar byas te /
T02TD2528E:186a-44: ji ltar rang byung mchod rten drung //
T02TD2528E:186a-45: ston pas khyim pa'i rtags spangs ltar //
T02TD2528E:186a-46: 'gro ba sems can don gyi phyir //
T02TD2528E:186a-47: khyim pa'i rtags rnams spang bar bya //
T02TD2528E:186a-51: ji ltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis //
T02TD2528E:186b-0: rgyal ba'i sku @186b lan bza' gsol ba ltar //
T02TD2528E:186b-1: de bzhin 'gro ba rnams la phan bya'i phyir //
T02TD2528E:186b-2: ngo tsha khrel yod gos mchog gsol bar bgyi //
T02TD2528E:186b-3: aom di bya ba stra na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:186b-6: aom ai mu yu ga sa ba ri kar ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:186b-7: de nas thugs kar rdo rje bzung la /
T02TD2528E:186b-8: mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD2528E:186b-9: dung dang dpal be'u g-yung drung 'khyil ba dang //
T02TD2528E:186b-10: bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis rnam brgyan pa //
T02TD2528E:186b-11: rgyal ba'i thugs la rnam par brgyan par shog / aom dva trim sha da ma h'a pu ru sha laksha ni shi ti aa nu byanytsa n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:186b-12: po ti dang glegs bam yin na yi ge a'a: hr'i: las rdo rje chos sam snang ba mtha' yas kyi skur bskyed pa'am /
T02TD2528E:186b-13: yang na yi ge bhr'um las yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'am /
T02TD2528E:186b-15: phyag dang po gnyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa /
T02TD2528E:186b-16: g-yas kyi gnyis pa na bgrang phreng /
T02TD2528E:186b-17: g-yon gyi gnyis pa na padma'i steng na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa bskyed la /
T02TD2528E:186b-18: ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas rgyas btab ste /
T02TD2528E:186b-19: dbang bskur nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la /
T02TD2528E:186b-20: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis na bza' gsol te /
T02TD2528E:186b-21: rgya rim pa bdun gyis gdab ste yig 'bru'i rang bzhin du zhu bar bsam mo //
T02TD2528E:186b-22: de la na bza' dbul ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD2528E:186b-23: di bya bastra ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:186b-24: na bza'i steng du mdud pa btab la /
T02TD2528E:186b-25: spra tshil las sin dhu ra'i rgyas btab la /
T02TD2528E:186b-26: aom badzra mu dra bandha ya aa dhi tishtha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:186b-28: na bza' dbul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
T02TD2528E:186b-29: byang chub yan lag rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD2528E:186b-30: dam chos gsung gi 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2528E:186b-31: na bza' dri ma med pa 'di //
T02TD2528E:186b-32: dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya //
T02TD2528E:186b-35: rigs rnam pa lnga'i sprul ba'i skur bskyed la /
T02TD2528E:186b-36: ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas /
T02TD2528E:186b-37: rgyas btab cing dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2528E:186b-38: mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la /
T02TD2528E:186b-39: mthar mchod rten gyi tshul du bzhugs pa la /
T02TD2528E:186b-40: aom a'a ra dze bi ra dze sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:186b-41: zhes bya bas sa dkar gsol lo //
T02TD2528E:187a-2: zhes bya bas bre gzugs par bya'o //
T02TD2528E:187a-3: tsakra ba ra tsa ta n'a ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:187a-4: zhes pas 'khor lo gzugs pa dang /
T02TD2528E:187a-5: aom tstsha tram ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:187a-7: aom kum bhi ra dhva dza ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:187a-8: zhes pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan gzugs pa dang /
T02TD2528E:187a-9: aom pa tam ka ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:187a-10: zhes pas ba dan gzugs pa dang /
T02TD2528E:187a-11: aom pa ta lam bha ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:187a-12: zhes bya bas dar dpyangs bcings pa dang /
T02TD2528E:187a-13: aom pushpa m'a la ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:187a-14: zhes bya bas me tog gi phreng ba gdags pa dang /
T02TD2528E:187a-15: aom ts'a ma ra ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:187a-16: zhes pas rnga yab kyis g-yab par bya'o //
T02TD2528E:187a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i cha lugs yin na so mangs dang /
T02TD2528E:187a-22: 'gro ba sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2528E:187a-23: rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la bslab bya zhes //
T02TD2528E:187a-24: ji ltar thugs dam rgya che pa bzhes pa bzhin //
T02TD2528E:187a-25: 'khor ba'i yo byad rnams ni dbul bar bya ;
T02TD2528E:187a-26: / aom aa pa yu ka sa pa ri ka ra ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2528E:187a-27: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
T02TD2528E:187a-28: byang chub sems dpa' thun mong du rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD2528E:187a-29: bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad dang /
T02TD2528E:187a-30: 'jig rten pa la bkra shis pa'i bil ba dang /
T02TD2528E:187a-34: gdugs gser gyi yu ba can rnams dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2528E:187a-35: dang por las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la dri'i thig le dang /
T02TD2528E:187a-36: me tog gi tshom bu bkod nas /
T02TD2528E:187a-37: ji ltar mi dbang 'khor los sgyur ba yis //
T02TD2528E:187a-38: rin chen sna bdun tshogs dang bcas pa ltar //
T02TD2528E:187a-39: rgyal ba rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' la ;
T02TD2528E:187a-40: / rin chen sna bdun tshogs ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD2528E:187a-41: lha yi dbang po lha min g-yul rgyal nas //
T02TD2528E:187a-42: bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bgyis //
T02TD2528E:187a-43: rgyal ba rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2528E:187a-44: bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis mchod par bgyi //
T02TD2528E:187a-45: 'jig rten khyim bdag rnams kyis dpal rnyed na //
T02TD2528E:187a-46: bil ba starga bum pa bzang dang bcas //
T02TD2528E:187a-47: mdun du bdar nas bkra shis byed pa ltar //
T02TD2528E:187a-48: rgyal ba sras dang bcas la dbul bar bgyi //
T02TD2528E:187a-49: de nas 'byor pa yod na sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2528E:187a-50: med na sgyed bu dkar po gsum btsugs la //
T02TD2528E:187b-0: sa las byas pa'i @187b snod gtsang mar //
T02TD2528E:187b-2: mngar gsum gyi gzhi la sman sna tshogs btab ste /
T02TD2528E:187b-4: rig pa'i me la yi ge brgya pa zlos shing bskol bar bya'o //
T02TD2528E:187b-5: de nas ts'a ru dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2528E:187b-6: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha gshegs su gsol ba ni /
T02TD2528E:187b-7: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras //
T02TD2528E:187b-8: tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams dang //
T02TD2528E:187b-9: gang dag cho ga ma tshang ba //
T02TD2528E:187b-10: de dag bzod pa mdzad par rigs //
T02TD2528E:187b-11: kun du zhi dang rgyas dang ni //
T02TD2528E:187b-12: yon bdag tshe la rab mdzad nas //
T02TD2528E:187b-13: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD2528E:187b-14: slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2528E:187b-15: sa dang chu dang me rlung gis //
T02TD2528E:187b-16: ji srid bskal bar 'jig par du //
T02TD2528E:187b-17: lha rnams kun gyi sku gzugs la //
T02TD2528E:187b-18: de srid bcom ldan bsrung bar mdzod //
T02TD2528E:187b-19: thugs bzang dgyes par gyur pa yis //
T02TD2528E:187b-20: slob dpon slob mar bcas pa yi //
T02TD2528E:187b-21: bu dang tsha bo bsrung mdzad nas ;
T02TD2528E:187b-22: / rang gnas dge bar gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2528E:187b-23: de nas dam tshig sems dpa' rang la bsdu'o //
T02TD2528E:187b-24: de nas yon bdag dang slob dpon gnyis kas sku'i gdan khri nas bzung nas me tog gi phreng ba phul te /
T02TD2528E:187b-25: ji srid me dang chu dang ni //
T02TD2528E:187b-26: rlung gis bskal ba 'jig par du //
T02TD2528E:187b-27: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2528E:187b-28: bcom ldan khyod ni bzhugs par mdzod //
T02TD2528E:187b-31: yul gyi bgegs la gtor ma byin la /
T02TD2528E:187b-32: 'gro ba sems can don slad du //
T02TD2528E:187b-33: bde gshegs rnams ni bzhugs kyi bar //
T02TD2528E:187b-34: bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2528E:187b-35: sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan bsrung bar mdzod //
T02TD2528E:187b-37: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la yang mchod pa phul la /
T02TD2528E:187b-38: bde bar gshegs ba'i sprul pa'i sku /
T02TD2528E:187b-39: bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes pas ji srid bcom ldan bzhugs kyi bar du srung bar mdzad du gsol /
T02TD2528E:187b-41: rab tu bsrung ba'i gnas brtan dang //
T02TD2528E:187b-42: khyim pa'i gtso bo rnams la yang //
T02TD2528E:187b-43: snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi sprul pa'i sku ni 'di yin gyis //
T02TD2528E:187b-44: 'di khyod kyis mnyams par srungs zhes brjod par byas la /
T02TD2528E:188a-2: shing rta la ba skyon nas dri'i thig la byas te /
T02TD2528E:188a-3: 'gro ba rnams dang bar bya ba'i phyir grong khyer rnams bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2528E:188a-4: yon gyi bdag po rnams kyang gru dang /
T02TD2528E:188a-8: / de la rab gnas kyi dus ni /
T02TD2528E:188a-14: gsang sngags rdo rje theg ba la //
T02TD2528E:188a-15: bstan pa'i snying po ma nus pas //
T02TD2528E:188a-16: rnal 'byor so so'i mos pa yis //
T02TD2528E:188a-18: ji ltar 'dod bzhin gshegs pa'i sku //
T02TD2528E:188a-19: lugs sku la sogs gzugs brnyan la //
T02TD2528E:188a-20: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni //
T02TD2528E:188a-21: byas pas sprul sku thob par shog / rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga / rab gnas kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
